question: Is it permisible to live along with fiancee?
answer:
QUESTION
AssalmuAlikum W W B i am going to marry with my AuntiesDaughter(Mother's sister).Due some reasons i am living in my aunties house where my fiancee is also there.Tell me is it permissible to live in a same house with fiancee.
ANSWER


Share:
It is not permissible to have any premarital relationship whatsoever. It is
also not healthy for you to live in your aunt's house if the laws of Hijaab
are not strictly adhered to. It is possible that the free environment in the
house may lead you to communication with your future wife.

There may be no limit for any progressive relationship thereafter.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
